game.title: Eternity's Edge
game.synopsis: In a world where time is broken, fragments of reality have shattered across the fabric of existence. Players take on the role of a temporal guardian tasked with repairing the timestream and preventing the destruction of entire civilizations.
game.beginning: The game begins in the remains of a ancient clockwork city, where the player discovers a cryptic message from a mysterious figure known only as "The Architect." This message sets the player on a journey across various eras and realities to gather fragments of time.
game.ending: As the player repairs the timestream, they uncover a sinister plot by an organization known as "The Time Reavers" who seek to exploit the chaos for their own gain. The final showdown takes place in a realm beyond time itself, where the player must face off against the leader of the Time Reavers and restore balance to eternity.
